data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fan, Qing-Hai, Walter, David E. (2011): Acamerobia inflatus gen. n. & sp. n. from Australia (Acari: Prostigmata: Raphignathoidea: Camerobiidae) with notes on the idiosomal chaetotaxy. Zootaxa 3045: 45-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.278839
